subproject.description:
The project seeks to address the need for a national socio-economic database. Such a database will improve the Trinidad and Tobago's  capacity to manage and make accessible reliable gender disaggregated data fo monitoring, evaluating and reporting on development indicators, particularly poverty indicators. The projects seeks to accompluish this through:
1) The creation and population of a national development infromation database.
2) Development of a Quality of Life Index (QOLI).
3) Build capacity in the Ministry of Planning and Development, in particular in the Central Statistical Office (CSO), the Economic Programme and Planning Division, and other lline Ministry personnel.
subproject.title: Nat'l Socio-economic Database

title: Development of a national socio-economic database
